name: Learning Chaos Magic Is Confusing (But I Must Keep Going Anyway)
name_original: Learning Chaos Magic Is Confusing (But I Must Keep Going Anyway)
description:
Learning Chaos Magic Is Confusing (But I Must Keep Going Anyway) is a small Broughlike made for 2021's 7DRL Challenge.

Your goal is to go as deep as you can into the dungeon, fighting monsters and learning new spells along the way. Some tips:

  • Move with WASD. Magic with SPACE.
  • Each floor, one of your spells gets randomized. The next spell to be changed is indicated by a golden arrow.
  • Pick up gems to recover magic points.
  • You'll recover one health point if you clear all enemies in a room.

You can follow me on Twitter to see more projects! :)

Monster sprites by Jon Bliss.
